Index.pushBoundaries: We push the boundaries of tattoo artistry, and then venture even further, just for the thrill of it.
Index.teamOfSpecialists: We are a team of specialists, crafting designs across a spectrum of styles and complexities. We don’t just ink, we are drawing with surgical precision, creating exceptional masterpieces on skin.
Index.coolArt: WE MAKE COOL ART THAT LASTS FOREVER.

FAQ.howPrice: How do we determine the price of each tattoo?
FAQ.howPriceAnswer: We calculate the price based on the size and complexity of each tattoo. Send us your ideas or some images that inspire you, and we will provide a price range suitable for your project.
FAQ.prepareAppointment: How should I prepare for my tattoo appointment?
FAQ.prepareAppointmentAnswer: The most important things to do before your appointment are to ensure you're well-rested, hydrated, and wearing comfortable clothing. Avoid alcohol, excessive caffeine, and any substances that could thin your blood for 24 hours before your session.
FAQ.bookAppointment: How do I book an appointment?
FAQ.bookAppointmentAnswer: You can easily book an appointment by contacting us directly through WhatsApp, Instagram, or Facebook. Click on the contact options available on our website or social media pages.
FAQ.appointmentWaitTimeAnswer: We schedule appointments based on artist availability and your specific needs. Usually, the wait time can vary from a few days to a few weeks, depending on the artist’s schedule.
FAQ.coverUpsAnswer: Yes, we specialize in cover-ups. The success of a cover-up depends on the existing tattoo's age, design, and color saturation. Please consult with our artists to discuss your options.
FAQ.messageContent: What should the message contain when booking an appointment?
FAQ.messageContentAnswer: When booking, please describe your tattoo idea, provide potential placement and size, and indicate whether you prefer black and white or color. If it's a cover-up, kindly mention this detail.
